content.rendered:
The YOUTH WE CAN! evening is a key event of the Convergences World Forum. For its edition in 2015, the Youth We Can! evening gathered over 700 young people seeking to give greater meaning to their lives and careers and act at their level towards a responsible society.

This year, the Youth We Can! evening has been dedicated to the new Sustainable Development Goals. It gathered three young social entrepreneurs and three inspiring figures, who shared their experiences and their ways of being agents of change. Together, they proposed their vision of a world “Zero Carbon, Zero Exclusion, Zero poverty”

 

Visit the YOUTH WE CAN! facebook page (in French only).
